item.description: This is the 4th and final free concert of the summer in Hamden and this is the BIG one!! http://www.hamden.com... Anyone planning on attending should get there early as everyone is talking about this show and there will be a big crowd. 2 days before this concert people are paying $60 a ticket to a sold out show in Norfolk, CT and we get to see them for free. Please join us and make this a great meetup. This Summer might not be the hottest on record, but we can make it one of the most memorable. As usual people can text or call me on (203) 927-2534 with questions.
item.how_to_find_us: Lets try some purple and yellow ballons for a change!!

group.name: The New Haven Area Dining Out Group
